metadata.title: CVE-2021-3899 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description:
There is a race condition in the 'replaced executable' detection that, with the correct local configuration, allow an attacker to execute arbitrary code as root.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2021-3899` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

apport - 2.20.11-0ubuntu71.2
apport-gtk - 2.20.11-0ubuntu71.2
apport-kde - 2.20.11-0ubuntu71.2
apport-noui - 2.20.11-0ubuntu71.2
apport-retrace - 2.20.11-0ubuntu71.2
apport-valgrind - 2.20.11-0ubuntu71.2
dh-apport - 2.20.11-0ubuntu71.2
python3-apport - 2.20.11-0ubuntu71.2
python3-problem-report - 2.20.11-0ubuntu71.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: apport package in impish was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.20.11-0ubuntu71.2').
